text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Feeling so alive
Hey
Lightning in the sky
Dancing we can’t deny

[Verse 2]
Barefoot on the ground
Spinning all around
Thunder makes a sound
Hearts with joy abound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rush
Feel no pain
Every drop a beat
Move our happy feet

[Verse 3]
Puddles make us laugh
Time is running fast
Here and now we grasp
Moments meant to last

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rush
Feel no pain
Every drop a beat
Move our happy feet

[Bridge]
Time stops when we play
In the world we made
Shadows fade away
Memories won't trade
title: Dancing in the Rain
